monogr.title: At One Remove: The Text of the New Testament in Early Translations and Quotations. Papers from the Eleventh Birmingham Colloquium on the Textual Criticism of the New Testament

body.bibl: Taylor, David G. K. “New Developments in the Textual Study of the Old Syriac Gospels.” In At One Remove: The Text of the New Testament in Early Translations and Quotations. Papers from the Eleventh Birmingham Colloquium on the Textual Criticism of the New Testament, edited by Hugh A. G. Houghton and Peter Montoro, 1–42. Texts and Studies, Third Series 24. Piscataway, New Jersey: Gorgias Press, 2020.

David G. K. Taylor, New Developments in the Textual Study of the Old Syriac Gospels, in At One Remove: The Text of the New Testament in Early Translations and Quotations. Papers from the Eleventh Birmingham Colloquium on the Textual Criticism of the New Testament, ed. Hugh A. G. Houghton and Peter Montoro, Texts and Studies, Third Series 24 (Piscataway, New Jersey: Gorgias Press, 2020), 1–42.
